AI Act

The AI Act is a new legislation that aims to regulate the development, distribution, and use of artificial intelligence. It represents the first global attempt to discipline the use of AI, setting a model for other jurisdictions. The normative aims to create a legal framework that balances innovation with fundamental rights protection, such as privacy and security. Conformity to the AI Act is a priority for organizations operating with AI systems in the EU or entering the market.

Key Concepts:

  • Regolamentazione dell'IA
  • Protezione dei diritti fondamentali
